meanings.sent1: She retints her hair every month to keep the color vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The painter retints the walls to cover up any imperfections.
meanings.sent3: After the rain, the rainbow retints the sky with its beautiful colors.
meanings.sent4: The artist retints the old painting, bringing new life to the colors.
meanings.sent5: The sun retints the sky as it sets, painting it in shades of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: The retints of the car windows made them darker and more stylish.
meanings.sent2: The retints on the photograph enhanced the overall look.
meanings.sent3: The retints on the glasses made them look like a new pair.
meanings.sent4: The retints of the sky at dusk created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The retints of the flowers in the garden added a pop of color to the landscape.
